introduce.title: What is Sketch Ideas
introduce.label: Product
introduce.description: A visual slot machine for sketch practice: fast spins, clear structure, and clean line-art references you can copy or download.

items.title: Visual Slot Spin
items.description: Hit Spin to cycle rapid previews and land on a fresh prompt plus reference in under a second.

items.title: Difficulty Lanes
items.description: Warm-up for single objects, Sketch for multi-object structure, Challenge for scenes and lighting.

items.title: Category Filters
items.description: Objects, animals, characters, poses, landscape, architecture, sci-fi, fantasy.

items.title: Pre-generated Line Art
items.description: Curated, consistent style to reduce AI noise and boost trust.

benefits.title: Why it keeps you drawing
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Built to trigger momentum, reduce decision fatigue, and keep sessions long.

items.title: Instant Momentum
items.description: No scrolling or reading lists - just spin and draw.

items.title: Trustworthy References
items.description: Clean line art and structural prompts feel sketch-ready and clear.

items.title: Sticky Loop
items.description: Next keeps you inside the same filter lane so you can iterate fast.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Have another question? Reach out and we will help.

items.question: Are the references AI-generated?
items.answer: Yes. The line-art pool is pre-generated and curated for consistency and speed. Images are for practice reference only.

items.question: Can I use the images commercially?
items.answer: The references are intended for learning and practice, not for commercial use.

items.question: Why line art instead of full renders?
items.answer: Line art keeps the focus on structure and reduces the artificial look that can distract practice.

items.question: How do the difficulty levels differ?
items.answer: Warm-up is a single object with a clear action or angle. Sketch adds 2-4 objects and spatial relationships. Challenge is a full scene with lighting, mood, and camera language.

items.question: Can I request new categories?
items.answer: Yes. We expand the pool based on demand and add new category packs over time.

items.question: How fast is a spin?
items.answer: Results are designed to appear within about one second, using a cached pre-generated pool.

cta.title: Start your sketch streak today
cta.description: Open the slot, pick a lane, and spin your next idea.
